title: Prohibits automobile liability insurers to refuse to insure or increase the premiums for insuring any automobile operated by a volunteer driver
summary: Prohibits automobile liability insurers from refusing to insure or increasing the premiums for insuring any automobile operated by a volunteer driver; defines a "volunteer driver" as a person who provides services, including transportation, without compensation to a not-for-profit corporation or charitable organization.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to discrimination against volunteer drivers in the issuance of motor vehicle liability insurance coverage
